enhanced_description: IndiHire is an established IT and digital talent recruitment firm, launched in 2011, with over a decade of experience and a track record of placing over 5,000 professionals. Headquartered in New Delhi, the company offers specialized services through dedicated units: Scaler Consulting for executive search, TechWise Digital for specialized IT staffing, and IndiHire Consultants for full-time IT roles. Their core focus is on enabling rapid tech hiring and supporting clients in finding software engineers for enterprise products and SaaS, accelerating digital transformation initiatives, and facilitating the establishment and enhancement of Global In-house Centers (GICs) in India for multinational corporations.
